titles.title: West Side Subway Corridor Improvements Act
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant for improvements to the New York City subway system, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/13/1995--Introduced. West Side Subway Corridor Improvements Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the New York City Transit Authority for making improvements to a certain section of the New York City subway system. Sets the Federal share of the project's cost at 80 percent. Authorizes appropriations.
